trans-unit.source: Defines the counter type, name, and Help string for a custom counter.
trans-unit.target: 定義計數器類型、 名稱和自訂的計數器的說明字串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.CounterCreationData"></xref> class, to a counter of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_NumberOfItems32" name="NumberOfItems32" href=""></xref>, and with empty name and help strings.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Diagnostics.CounterCreationData"></xref>類別，以類型的計數器<xref uid="langword_csharp_NumberOfItems32" name="NumberOfItems32" href=""> </xref>，且具有空白名稱和說明的字串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.CounterCreationData"></xref> class, to a counter of the specified type, using the specified counter name and Help strings.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Diagnostics.CounterCreationData"></xref>類別，以指定的型別，並使用指定的計數器名稱和說明字串的計數器。

trans-unit.source: The name of the counter, which must be unique within its category.
trans-unit.target: 計數器，其類別目錄中必須是唯一的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The text that describes the counter's behavior.
trans-unit.target: 文字描述的計數器行為。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType"></xref> that identifies the counter's behavior.
You have specified a value for counterType that is not a member of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的值 counterType 也就是不是成員的列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom counter's description.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自訂計數器的描述。

trans-unit.source: The text that describes the counter's behavior.
trans-unit.target: 文字描述的計數器行為。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the custom counter.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自訂的計數器名稱。

trans-unit.source: A name for the counter, which is unique in its category.
trans-unit.target: 計數器，也就是其類別目錄中是唯一的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not between 1 and 80 characters long or contains double quotes, control characters or leading or trailing spaces.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是介於 1 到 80 個字元之間，或包含雙引號、 控制字元或前置或尾端空格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the performance counter type of the custom counter.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自訂計數器的效能計數器型別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType"></xref> that defines the behavior of the performance counter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType"> </xref> ，定義行為的效能計數器。

trans-unit.source: You have specified a type that is not a member of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 您已指定不是成員的型別<xref href="System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType"></xref>列舉型別。
